title: "Image analysis based on machine learning reliably identifies haematological malignancies"
excerpt: "Myelodysplastic syndrome (MDS) is a disease of the stem cells in the bone marrow, which disturbs the maturing and differentiation of blood cells. Annually, some 200 Finns are diagnosed with MDS, which can develop into acute leukemia."
